REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C T f0080 reute u f BC-LOW-SUGAR-PRICES-MAY 03-13 0095

TEXT.TITLE: LOW SUGAR PRICES MAY ATTRACT SOVIET/CHINESE
TEXT.BODY: Any further decline in raw sugar prices is likely to attract buying from the Soviet Union and China, Woodhouse, Drake and Carey said in their latest weekly market report. Present lower terminal values may be a reflection of the lack of renewed prompt offtake, particularly from these two large consumers, the report said. The week has seen good demand for Thai raws, particulary for October/December shipment, which has traded above twenty points premium to the October New York delivery, it said. Reuter
